sense.def:
The presentation of information
je razgrnitev podatkov pred ljudmi.

seg.quote: ...the collection and presentation of statistical data.

sense.def:
Presentation
je videz stvari in vtis, ki ga ta stvar zbuja.

seg.quote: Presentation is very important in cooking.

sense.def:
A presentation
je uradna prireditev, na kateri nekomu nekaj izročijo, na primer darilo.

seg.quote: I said I would not be able to attend the presentation.

sense.def:
A presentation
je dogajanje, kot je gledališka predstava ali predavanje, ki poteka pred občinstvom;

seg.quote: Darwin was urged to deliver a presentation on the subject.
